HzStream

A struct to store a buffer.  This is also used by <HzDeserializer> to read off bytes.

See Also

<HzDeserializer>

Functions
hz_stream_create
HZ_STATIC HzStream hz_stream_create(
const uint8_t *data,
size_t size
)

Creates a byte stream, holds data and a bump pointer allowing seeking, unpacking various primitives from memory.

Parameters
data
const uint8_t*

The pointer to the memory.

size
size_t

The size of the block (If this is 0, then there's no bound check).

Returns

A <hz_stream_t> instance.

struct
hz_segment_t

A struct used to store a segment of text and the information required to shape it.

hzShapePlanApplyGSUBLookup
void hzShapePlanApplyGSUBLookup(
HzShapePlan *plan,
hz_feature_t feature,
uint16_t lookupIndex,
hz_buffer_t *in,
hz_buffer_t *out,
int x1,
int x2,
int depth
)

apply GSUB lookup table to glyph range [x1,x2] within the segment buffer.  depth is the current nested lookup depth index, as this can be recursive.
